snippet: The Princeton Battlefield Society wants to preserve the site where George Washington’s troops defeated the British at the Battle of Princeton in January 1777.
abstract: Princeton Battlefield Society is trying to stop plans by Institute of Advanced Study to build housing on portion of Revolutionary War battlefield that it owns in Princeton, NJ; society hopes to stall construction until courts can come to conclusion about case.
lead_paragraph: The Princeton Battlefield Society wants to preserve the site where George Washington’s troops defeated the British at the Battle of Princeton in January 1777.

headline.main: As Housing Project Starts, Another Battle Flares on a Revolutionary War Site in Princeton
headline.print_headline: Preservationists Seek to Halt Project on Revolutionary War Site
